name: Intergalactic Dices
description:
You need to "roll" the dices.

W - jump

A - move/turn left

D - move/turn left

SPACE - shoot

Note: If you hold more the jump button the dice will jump higher.

How to play the game: 

    1. Download the zip.

    2. Open "GMTK_GameJam_48h.exe".

    3. Enjoy.

To kill the black one you need to jump on his head and for the blue one you just need to shoot :)
